text: Kandi ntimube nkawa mukenyezi yaca urunyuzi rwiwe ibice bice mugihe rwari rukomeye, hanyuma mugira indahiro zanyu kuba ariyo nzira zuguhendana hagati yanyu, kubera umurwi umwe w’abantu kuba ariwo ufise ubushobozi gusumba uwundi, mu vy’ukuri Imana iriko irabagerageza muri iyo nzira, kandi ntankeka izobibereka k’umusi w’imperuka kuvyo mwahora mutumvikanako
